title: TEXAS HOLD ’EM

description.plain:
“TEXAS HOLD ‘EM” is one of Beyonce’s surprise singles from her upcoming country-themed album, which will serve as a follow up to Renaissance and is the second act in the act 3 project. It was teased during her Super Bowl LVIII commercial and shortly released after.

The country song has heavy western and southern influences and can be seen as a love letter to the south and Beyoncé’s southern roots. The song features a banjo and viola played by Rhiannon Giddens.

embed_content: Read “TEXAS HOLD ’EM” by Beyoncé on Genius
recording_location: Kings Landing West (Los Angeles, CA), The Trailer (East Hampton, NY), Parkwood West (Los Angeles, CA) and Dezert Flower Studios (Los Angeles, CA)

body.plain:
“TEXAS HOLD ‘EM” is one of Beyonce’s surprise singles from her upcoming country-themed album, which will serve as a follow up to Renaissance and is the second act in the act 3 project. It was teased during her Super Bowl LVIII commercial and shortly released after.

The country song has heavy western and southern influences and can be seen as a love letter to the south and Beyoncé’s southern roots. The song features a banjo and viola played by Rhiannon Giddens.
